data.title: The Game Awards 2022 Winners: The Full List
data.meta_description: The Game Awards 2022 are underway now, and we're updating this page with all of the awards winners of the night.
data.text:
The Game Awards 2022 are a wrap, and Elden Ring took home the biggest award of the night: Game of the Year. God of War Ragnarok also did pretty well for itself, taking home a handful of awards.

If you want to see all of the new trailers and reveals, check out everything announced at The Game Awards 2022.

The full list of winners for The Game Awards 2022 are as follows:

Recognizing a game that delivers the absolute best experience across all creative and technical fields.
